translation.Short Description: Computer Engineer | Bachelor's of Computer Engineering | Studying for Master's of Computer Engineering
translation.Long Description: During my student years, I gained professional experience and I was involved in an international project that allowed me to step out of my comfort zone. This international experience gave me the opportunity to meet different persons and cultures, as well as improve my English language. After this international experience, I was selected to be part of the Summer Camp at Critical Software, where I learned new technologies and how a big company works in its projects. At the moment, I'm doing my Master's of Computer Engineering - Computing Systems at Instituto Superior de Engenharia do Porto.

jobs.Job Description: I developed several projects for many areas, from civil construction, to retail, to logistics, etc. The goal was to create software that satisfies the customer's ideas. I optimized my skills in direct contact with the customer, proactivity, acquiring experience as a freelancer and time organization, while I was doing my bachelor’s degree.
In this summer internship, besides of learning new tools of managing projects and new technologies for software development, I had the opportunity to meet new people spread across Portugal.

As a web developer I was responsible for developing software for customers using various technologies and programming languages. It was my first professional experience where I started to develop skills such as: communication and direct contact with the customer.

facs.University Name: Instituto Superior de Engenharia do Porto
facs.University Course: Master's of Computer Engineering | Computing Systems

facs.University Description: Allowed me to communicate in English and learn a new technology and programming language by developing a mobile application for a Belgian company in the area of education (Onderwijstalent).I have developed skills in software project management, communication, teamwork, flexibility, adaptation and learning agility.

Allowed me to improve programming techniques, learn new technologies and languages, create and manage databases, manage and plan computer networks and learn artificial intelligence.I developed skills in software project management, information processing, algorithm development and analysis of mathematical methods.
